parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.
Assent, agreement, concord, alliance. From sugkatatithemai; a deposition in company with, i.e. accord with.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
A temple, a shrine, that part of the temple where God himself resides. From a primary naio; a fane, shrine, temple.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
An idol, false god. From eidos; an image; by implication, a heathen god, or the worship of such.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A temple, a shrine, that part of the temple where God himself resides. From a primary naio; a fane, shrine, temple.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To dwell in, be settled (stationary) in; met: To be indwelling. From en and oikeo; to inhabit.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From en and peripateo; to perambulate on a place, i.e. to be occupied among persons.
And, even, also, namely.

str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
